answers.answer: At first I thought Diabetes but since you said you had lab work. and it was good I dont know sorry.
You should have your pituitary gland check and also testosterone level.Good luck,Millard

question: I am 43 years old i have been feeling shakey jittery very tired lite headed and dazed. does anyone have any ideas what this could be? blood work heart test come out normal. so i tired of this happening. sometimes if i take a nap i wake  up feeling better but now always at a place where i can take one when this happens.This discussion is related to/posts/Undiagnosed-Symptoms/Weak-and-Shakey/show/202115.
title: shakey jittery very tired lite headed dazed
